name: DNS Reconnaissance
description: Enumerate DNS records for targets and subdomains.

steps.name: Brute Force Subdomains
steps.command: for sub in $(cat subdomains.txt); do host $sub.target.com; done

steps.name: Reverse Lookup
steps.command: for ip in $(seq 1 254); do host 192.168.1.$ip; done | grep target.com
